django.core.management.color
============================

.. py:module:: django.core.management.color

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Sets up the terminal color scheme.



Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.core.management.color.HAS_COLORAMA


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.core.management.color.Style


Functions
---------

.. autoapisummary::

   django.core.management.color.supports_color
   django.core.management.color.make_style
   django.core.management.color.no_style
   django.core.management.color.color_style


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: HAS_COLORAMA
   :value: False


.. py:function:: supports_color()

   Return True if the running system's terminal supports color,
   and False otherwise.


.. py:class:: Style

.. py:function:: make_style(config_string='')

   Create a Style object from the given config_string.

   If config_string is empty django.utils.termcolors.DEFAULT_PALETTE is used.


.. py:function:: no_style()

   Return a Style object with no color scheme.


.. py:function:: color_style(force_color=False)

   Return a Style object from the Django color scheme.
